title: It's 10am and Dad's Doing Jell-O Shots. Must Be Parents' Weekend
description: Article URL: https://www.wsj.com/lifestyle/parenting-college-football-game-tailgate-michigan-arizona-usc-78c72532 Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=42103195 Points: 27 # Comments: 18
author: zeroonetwothree
excerpt: Fall tradition at colleges used to be a time for campus tours and welcome speeches. Now parents want to party
text: As she geared up to visit her daughter at the University of Arizona last month, Melissa DeLeon stuffed her Lululemon fanny pack with the bare essentials: Disposable beer koozies, hair ties, Drip Drop hydration powder and red Wet Ones wipes.Fall is the height of parents’ weekend at colleges across the country. While schools might offer campus tours, welcome speeches, mingling with professors and other wholesome activities, many parents have other plans. They want to party.Copyright ©2024 Dow Jones & Company, Inc. All Rights Reserved. 87990cbe856818d5eddac44c7b1cdeb8
html:
As she geared up to visit her daughter at the University of Arizona last month, Melissa DeLeon stuffed her Lululemon fanny pack with the bare essentials: Disposable beer koozies, hair ties, Drip Drop hydration powder and red Wet Ones wipes.

Fall is the height of parents’ weekend at colleges across the country. While schools might offer campus tours, welcome speeches, mingling with professors and other wholesome activities, many parents have other plans. They want to party.
